title: Drawing, Design for Round Table on Baluster-Shaped Support, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Round Table on Baluster-Shaped Support
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: LX.X8 / 110.00; at lower right of image with arrow pointing to right leg: Brass; at upper right of image with arrow pointing to table top: Top 3'-6" Diam
dimensions: 20.3 x 21.4 cm (8 x 8 7/16 in. ); upper and lower margins irregular
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Round molded top raised on turned and molded baluster-shaped support carved with acanthus leaves terminating in  4 boldly scrolling splayed legs with brass feet on casters.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Round Table on Baluster-Shaped Support, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-168.
